text: right Ptilodactylidae is a family of toe winged beetles in the order Coleoptera. There are about 6 genera and 15 described species of North American Ptilodactylidae. ==Genera== Subfamily Unplaced * Ptilodactyloides Motschulsky, 1856 * Aphebodactyla Chatzimanolis, Cashion, Engel, & Falin, 2012 * Therius Guérin-Méneville, 1849 * Falsoptilodactyla Pic, 1958 * Valoka Deleve, 1872 * Podabrocephalus Pic, 1913 (or in Podabrocephalidae Pic) Subfamily Anchytarsinae Champion, 1897 * Anchycteis Horn, 1880 * Anchytarsus Guérin-Méneville, 1843 * Epilichas White, 1859 * Byrrocryptus Broun, 1893 * Pseudoepilichas Armstrong & Nakane, 1956 Subfamily Cladotominae Pic, 1914 * Cladotoma Westwood, 1837 * Paralichus White, 1859 * Drupeus Lewis, 1895 * Hovactyla Fairmaire, 1901 * Pseudocladotoma Pic, 1918 * Austrolichus Lawrence & Stribling, 1992 Subfamily Apoglossinae Champion, 1897 * Apoglossa Guérin- Méneville, 1843 * Bradytoma Guérin-Méneville, 1849 * Octoglossa Guérin- Méneville, 1843 Subfamily Araeopidiinae Lawrence, 1991 * Araeopidius Cockerell, 1906 Subfamily Ptilodactylinae Laporte, 1836 * Lachnodactyla Champion, 1897 * Daemon Laporte, 1836 * Ptilodactyla Illiger, 1807 * Pherocladus Fairmaire, 1881 * Stirophora Champion, 1897 * Falsotherius Pic, 1913 * Chelonariomorphus Pic, 1916 * Microdrupeus Nakane, 1993 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * * * * Category:Byrrhoidea Category:Beetle families
title: Ptilodactylidae
